# llms.txt - Guidelines for Large Language Models
# Site: Tribute to Marie-Roc Fritz Stephenson

User-agent: *
Disallow: /assets/
Disallow: /family-only/
Allow: /

# Content usage preferences
Training: disallow
Indexing: allow
Chatbot-access: allow

# Purpose of site
Purpose: This site is a personal tribute to Marie-Roc Fritz Stephenson, intended to preserve his legacy and share his story with loved ones and the public.

# Ethical considerations
Respect: Please treat all content with cultural sensitivity and emotional respect.
Attribution: Required when referencing site content.

# Contact for permissions or inquiries
Contact: stepminer@gmail.com
